record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S.J. RES. 32
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S.J. RES. 32 -- (Senate - May 13, 2008)

[Page: S4121]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that S.J. Res. 32, introduced earlier today, is at the desk. I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A resolution (S.J. Res. 32) limiting the issuance of a letter of offer with respect to a certain proposed sale of defense articles and defense services to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask for its second reading and object to my own request.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be read a second time on the next legislative day.
